name: Budapest Bots Meetup 1.0
description:
Hi fellow Botmasters, 

let us come together and start chatting about bots! This will be the first event hosted by Budapest Bots but we hope many more will follow.


At this inagural event we are going to discuss what chatbots are, their current state and what the future might look like. But really, we just want to facilitate the coming together of people with a similar interest. 

Agenda:

18:45-19:00 - Arrival

19:00-19:30 - Introduction to Chatbots

19:30-19:50 - How to start building bots for Messenger

20:00-21:00 - Open discussion, networking


Follow Budapest Bots on Facebook

Please RSVP and if you do, come along, we have limited places available.

Hope to see you there!

Organizer Humans András and Matt
agenda: 19:30-19:50 - How to start building bots for Messenger

talks.title: 19:30-19:50 - How to start building bots for Messenger
